name: A blackened mithril tower shield
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'wall of steel'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
When worn by a dwarf, this shield is rumoured to augment certain immunities.
